description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for a library screen that lists user playlists using mock data. It manages state asynchronously fetching playlists via a data service, and displays either a loading indicator or a list of playlist cards.

classes.name: LibraryScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the library screen which displays user playlists.

classes.name: _LibraryScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing the internal state of LibraryScreen, including data fetching and UI rendering logic.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget state and triggers data loading.

methods.name: _load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches user playlists from the DataService and updates the UI state.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, displaying either a loading indicator or a list of playlist cards.
